entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
